summary: This is a guide to remove the orange glows from ELFX when used with open cities
descriptionHtml:
This is a guide to remove the orange glows from ELFX when used with open cities

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/8058/?]Open Cities[/url] by Arthmoor
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27043/?]Enhanced Lights and FX[/url] by anamorfus

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25859/?]tes5edit

[/url]I will upload a patch if I can get permissions from the mod authors
author: Harold
